summary:
Incompatible with Perkus Maximus, DON'T USE THE PATCHER ON THIS MOD
I removed all the unstable and ridiculously overpowered spells and also 80% of the weapons.
That way it shouldn't be a problem when the mod's contents get into leveled lists
descriptionHtml:
[quote][/quote]Incompatible with Perkus Maximus, DON'T USE THE PATCHER ON THIS MOD
(move the .esp out before running the skyproc patcher)

Quote of the Author:

[b][quote]I can not update MODs anymore.
and, I do not have a special edition, I cannot support you.

If you remodel my MODs and want to show it,
You do not need my permission. Please use it freely.
But ColorfulMagic uses a resource of other MOD a lot so many.
Please write all credit.[/quote][/b]

I tested all the spells in the mod and deleted all spell books of ridiculous and unstable spells.
I also removed most weapons because the power attack mechanics seemed to crash the game sometimes too.
Of course i checked all references so the summoned monsters should still have their weapons.
I didn't remove any of the armors though.
Now there are around 120 spells left in the mod.
This is the "less powerful, whiterun" version, so the traders are found in arcadia's cauldron.

If anybody wants to help me making this mod more stable, contact me so i can add you as author or feel free to publish your own version.
author: 184Gesu - modified by OwnlyMe
